ygData.subject: Re: Searched part of OOT for 'book'...
ygData.msgSnippet: What kind of beasties are down there?  Been said there s sharks, what level are they?  I think that box is used for a quest in Freeport. ... gr0k - Stranger in
ygData.messageBody:
What kind of beasties are down there? Been said there's sharks, what level
are they? I think that box is used for a quest in Freeport.

---
gr0k - Stranger in a Strange Land - http://www.juju.org
"Linux... find out what you've been missing while
you've been rebooting Windows NT" - Infoworld

----- Original Message -----
From: <sragan@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, October 08, 1999 12:15 AM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Searched part of OOT for 'book'...


> From: sragan@...
>
> Hello Folks,
>
> I took out the 'ol fishbone ear ring tonight and did a bit of searching in
OOT. The zone is HUGE, so I didnt finish before I had to quit.
>
> The area that I searched (and found nothing but a shark guarding a lock
box) is the area south of the 'sisters of erollisis' isle and 'seafury
cyclops' isle all the way to the south zone border. I did not search north
of these isles or west of them.
>
> So if you drew a box with these coordinates you would get the area that I
have searched:
>
> 2000, -6000
> 2000, -10000
> -5000,-6000
> -5000, -1000
>
> Make a box out of these and that is the area that I have searched so far
in OOT.
>
> I would highly reccomend a fish bone ear ring as you are spending a LOT of
time underwater.
>
> I also searched all the water in east freeport from the docks and found
nothing...
>
> Cheers,
>
> "FizzWizz of tunare"
>
>
